project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple command-line contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and users will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a new contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact
Implement functionality to update an existing contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement JSON file read/write operations for contact storage
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they function correctly
